resources.string: I\'ve used Android Studio a bit, so I\'m pretty comfortable with how things work.
I know the basics of JAVA though Object Oriented Programming but I am seeking to further improve myself and my knowledge.
I also know basic C, C++, Bash Script, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Currently a 3rd Year Diploma in Information Communication Technology graduating student at Polytechnic University of the Philippines
If there\'s something I want to learn I will give my 101% to make it my own.
Frontend Development | Backend Development | Firebase | Object Oriented Programming
